## Query.deleteMany() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Deletes all matched documents

**Signature:**

```typescript
deleteMany(query?: QueryRootFilter, options?: QueryDeleteManyOptions): this;
```

## Parameters

[QueryRootFilter](./iodm-query.queryrootfilter.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Delete query to match documents


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

[QueryDeleteManyOptions](./iodm-query.querydeletemanyoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Query options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

this


## Example


```ts
const query = new Query(idb, "store-name");
await query.deleteMany({ $key: key }, options);
```
